metadata.name: MpiExec Lolbin
metadata.comment: Detects a certain command line flag combination used by mpiexec.exe LOLBIN from HPC pack that can be used to execute any other binary

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\mpiexec.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=d8b52ef6aaa3a81501bdfff9dbb96217')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /n 1 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -n 1 '))))

output.summary: Detects a certain command line flag combination used by mpiexec.exe LOLBIN from HPC pack that can be used to execute any other binary
